li.p: benefits payable in exchange for future service (see paragraphs BC256 and BC257);
recognition of termination benefits (see paragraphs BC258–BC260);
measurement of termination benefits (see paragraph BC261); and
interaction with restructuring costs, plan amendments, curtailments and settlements (see paragraphs BC262–BC268).
